```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(extrafont)
#font_import()
loadfonts(device = "win")

library(foot)
library(osmdata)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(tmap)
library(wesanderson)

tmap_options(design.mode = TRUE)
tmap_mode("view")
```

## Get Data

```{r}
# Load buildings previously saved from OSM

bruBuildings <- readRDS(here::here("2021/data/rawData/bruBuildings.rds")) %>% 
  select(osm_id, 
         geometry) %>% 
  st_transform(3857)
```

## Wrangle Data

```{r}
# Calculate building orientations

bruOrientations <- bruBuildings %>% 
  fs_mbr()
```

```{r}
# Add orientations back to the dataframe

bruBuildings$angle <- bruOrientations

bruBuildings %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = angle)) +
  geom_histogram()

```

```{r}
# Now, I want a minimum bounding box

bruBound <- bruBuildings %>% 
  st_bbox() %>% 
  st_as_sfc()

mapBound <- bruBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(7000)

mapLimits <- bruBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(7500)
```

```{r}
# Clip buildings to the mapbounds

bruBuildings <- bruBuildings %>% 
  st_intersection(mapBound)
```

```{r}
# Group buildings by orientation

bruBuildings <- bruBuildings %>%
  mutate(
    group = case_when(
      angle < 22.5 ~ "NS",
      angle > 22.5 &
        angle < 67.5 ~ "NW-SE",
      angle > 67.5 &
        angle < 112.5 ~ "EW",
      angle > 112.5 &
        angle < 157.5 ~ "SW-NE",
      angle > 157.5 &
        angle < 202.5 ~ "NS",
      angle > 202.5 &
        angle < 247.5 ~ "NW-SE",
      angle > 247.5 &
        angle < 292.5 ~ "EW",
      angle > 292.5 &
        angle < 337.5 ~ "SW-NE",
      angle > 337.5 ~ "NS"
    )
  )

```

## Build Map

```{r}
# Build the base layer

vizBase <-  tm_shape(mapLimits) +
  tm_fill(col = "#f1eee9") +
  tm_shape(mapBound) +
  tm_fill(col = "#f1eee9") +
  tm_layout(bg.color = "#f1eee9",
            frame = F,
            frame.lwd = NA,
            attr.outside = F,
            outer.margins = 0,
            asp = 0,
            scale = 0.8,
            main.title = "Building Footprints",
            main.title.color = "#000000",
            main.title.size = 1.75,
            main.title.fontfamily = "Arial Narrow",
            main.title.fontface = 2,
            main.title.position = "center",
            title = "Brussels Capital Region",
            title.color = "#000000",
            title.size = 1,
            title.position = c("center", "TOP"),
            title.fontface = 2) + 
  tm_credits("#30DayMapChallenge | Day 03 | Anirudh Govind | Nov 2021\nMap data Â© OpenStreetMap contributors and available from https://www.openstreetmap.org",
             col = "#000000",
             size = 0.75,
             position = c("left", "bottom"),
             fontfamily = "Arial Narrow")
```

```{r}
# Buildings layer

myPalette <- wes_palette("BottleRocket2")

vizBuildings <- tm_shape(bruBuildings) +
  tm_fill(col = "group",
          palette = myPalette,
          legend.show = F)
```

```{r}
# Combine layers

viz <- vizBase +
  vizBuildings
```

## Export

```{r}
# Export the map as an image to upload onto twitter

tmap_save(tm = viz,
          filename = here::here("2021/exports/Day3.png"),
          dpi = 450,
          width = 200,
          height = 200,
          units = "mm")

```
